com.uofa.adventure_app.adapter

Class StoryGridAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseAdapter
      • com.uofa.adventure_app.adapter.StoryGridAdapter

  • public class StoryGridAdapter
extends BaseAdapter
    Adapter for the Browse view Story list. Displays all of the Stories in an organized and good looking manner.
    Author:
    Kevin Lafond
